It must arise from a very deep place within us. This life-changing motivation verily forces its way out of us, demanding that we take action. That is the motivation that propels people to monumental acts of courage, willpower, perseverance, and, ultimately, change.\""},{"author":"Ted Kulawiak","tags":["inspirational"],"quote":"\"The greatest inspiration comes to us from our own life experiences\""},{"author":"Mohith Agadi","tags":["inspiration","inspirational","inspire","mohith-agadi-quotes","mohith-quotes","motivate","motivation","motivational","quote","quotes","quotes-by-mohith"],"quote":"\"Motivate Yourself to Inspire Others.\""}]}

response.author: Richelle E. Goodrich
response.title: Eena, The Tempter's Snare
response.quote: "Don't ever give up. Don't ever give in. Don't ever stop trying. Don't ever sell out. And if you find yourself succumbing to one of the above for a brief moment, pick yourself up, brush yourself off, whisper a prayer, and start where you left off. But never, ever, ever give up."

response.author: Kristopher Morris
response.quote: "Give up isn't going to help Keep going on will help"

response.author: Isabella Milan
response.quote: "Never give up! God's got you!"

response.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana
response.quote: "Never give up. There is always something you can do"

response.quote: "Never give up just because you failed initially"

response.author: Manu Pratap
response.quote: "If you Never Give Up, you can Beat The Best !!"

response.quote: "Failure is a teacher, success, a motivator"

response.author: Debasish Mridha
response.quote: "It takes courage, strength, and conviction to love someone deeply, persistently, and endlessly."

response.author: Debasish Mridha

response.quote: "Love can only be found through the act of loving."

response.quote: "The best way to prepare for death is to live life to its fullest. "

response.author: ellen degeneres
response.title: Seriously... I'm Kidding
response.quote: "Some people believe that to find happiness, you should live each day of your life as if it's your last because that way you will appreciate every single moment you have. Other people believe that you should live each day as if it's your first because then every day can be the beginning of a new journey."

response.author: Santonu Kumar Dhar
response.quote: "Life is full of beautiful moments. Live your life to the fullest. And do what you love. #LIFE OF LOVE"

response.author: Jazalyn
response.title: Hollow: a Love Like a Life
response.quote: "Life is love; Love is life; And there's a love like a life And a life like a love"

response.author: Drew Gerald
response.quote: "The most fulfilling love life comes from a love of life and a life of love."

response.author: Debasish Mridha
response.quote: "Life is an experiment and experience. Life is miraculous and a miracle. Life is a giant canvas and an elusive art. Life is playing field for spirit and spiritual. Life is for love and love is for life."

response.author: Debasish Mridha
response.quote: "Life is an experiment and experience. Life is miraculous and a miracle. Life is a giant canvas and an elusive art. Life is playing field for spirit and spiritual. Life is for love and love is for life."

response.author: Jim Taylor
response.quote: "True and lasting motivation can't, unfortunately, come from outside. It must arise from a very deep place within us. This life-changing motivation verily forces its way out of us, demanding that we take action. That is the motivation that propels people to monumental acts of courage, willpower, perseverance, and, ultimately, change."

response.author: Debasish Mridha
response.quote: "A smile is the expression of ecstasy of life."

response.author: Jasleen Kaur Gumber
response.quote: "Dear 2016, If I had any defeats in your team, I am glad they were on my terms. Love, Defeated Winner"

response.author: Yuto Tsukuda
response.title: 食戟のソーマ 30 [Shokugeki no Souma 30]

response.author: Simon Zingerman
response.title: We All Need Heroes: Stories of the Brave and Foolish
response.quote: "Building positive customer experiences will help create passionate customers who will spread your message on their behalf - almost like an evangelist."

response.author: Jeff Garvin
response.title: Symptoms of Being Human
response.quote: "I've found my cause."

response.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana
response.quote: "More often than not, an inspirational or motivational speaker is someone who makes money from telling us that we can do all of the things that we can do … and pretty much all of the things that we cannot do."

response.quote: "No one can motivate you, until you motivate yourself, Self- motivation is the foundational key to all success."

response.author: Jim Taylor
response.quote: "True and lasting motivation can't, unfortunately, come from outside. It must arise from a very deep place within us. This life-changing motivation verily forces its way out of us, demanding that we take action. That is the motivation that propels people to monumental acts of courage, willpower, perseverance, and, ultimately, change."

response.author: Daniel H. Pink
response.title: Drive: The Surprising Truth About What Motivates Us
response.quote: "Motivation is deeply personal and only you know what words or images will resonate with you."

response.author: Timothy Pina
response.quote: "After being diagnose as bi-polar...I feel that laughter is the best medicine for all. I find that I can't write humorously and be depressed at the same time.:)"

response.author: Micalea Smeltzer
response.title: Unraveling
response.quote: "Laughter can cure anything, when you laugh, it pushes the darkness out of your soul."

response.author: Avery Stocking
response.quote: "Laugh whenever possible. It's the best solution to happiness."

response.author: Alaric Hutchinson
response.quote: "On my journey from the fantastical to the practical, spirituality has gone from being a mystical experience to something very ordinary and a daily experience. Many don't want this, instead they prefer spiritual grandeur, and I believe that is what keeps enlightenment at bay. We want big revelations of complexity that validates our perceptions of the divine. What a let down it was to Moses when God spoke through a burning bush! But that is exactly the simplicity of it all. Our spiritual life is our ordinary life and it is very grounded in every day experience. For me, it is the daily practice of kindness, mindfulness, happiness, and peace."

response.author: Steve Maraboli
response.title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
response.quote: "While spirituality provides an efficient and endless fuel for your mind and body, you must burn that fuel with human action towards your goals, dreams, and desires."

response.author: Andrew Schneider
response.quote: "There is one thing that all true spirituality has in common, whether that spirituality is derived from faith, from science, from nature or from the arts - a sense of wonder."

response.author: Alaric Hutchinson
response.quote: "On my journey from the fantastical to the practical, spirituality has gone from being a mystical experience to something very ordinary and a daily experience. Many don't want this, instead they prefer spiritual grandeur, and I believe that is what keeps enlightenment at bay. We want big revelations of complexity that validates our perceptions of the divine. What a let down it was to Moses when God spoke through a burning bush! But that is exactly the simplicity of it all. Our spiritual life is our ordinary life and it is very grounded in every day experience. For me, it is the daily practice of kindness, mindfulness, happiness, and peace."

response.author: Jane Roberts
response.title: Seth Speaks: The Eternal Validity of the Soul
response.quote: "True spirituality is a thing of joy and of the earth, and has nothing to do with fake adult dignity. It has nothing to do with long words and sorrowful faces. It has to do with the dance of consciousness that is within you, and with the sense of spiritual adventure that is within your hearts."

response.author: Dalai Lama XIV
response.quote: "Those who have little interest in spirituality shouldn't think that human inner values don't apply to you. The inner peace of an alert and calm mind are the source of real happiness and good health. Our human intelligence tells us which of our emotions are positive and helpful and which are damaging and to be restrained or avoided. - 12/7/2012 on his Facebook page"
